    • Uses of IUpdateStrategy in update

      Classes in update that implement IUpdateStrategy 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  BreathingStrategy
      This strategy changes size every update
      class  ColorStrategy
      This strategy changes color every update
      class  CurveStrategy
      This strategy changes direction of velocity every update
      class  DrunkenStrategy
      This strategy does all kinds of updates randomly.
      class  HoldStrategy
      This strategy that remove the move()
      class  MultiStrategy
      The strategy that holds multiple strategies
      class  StraightStrategy
      This strategy does nothing
      class  SwitcherStrategy 
      class  WanderStrategy
      This strategy that randomly changes direction every update

      Modifier and Type Field and Description

      The first strategy, could also be a MultiStrategy
      private IUpdateStrategy MultiStrategy._s2
      The second strategy, could also be a MultiStrategy

      The initial strategy (StraightStrategy)

      No-op singleton implementation of IUpdateStrategy
